thread.title: Ground News - Women continue to advance in the Ukrainian army, four thousand of them are already fighting on the front
thread.title_full: Ground News - Women continue to advance in the Ukrainian army, four thousand of them are already fighting on the front

author: iDNES.cz
title: Ground News - Women continue to advance in the Ukrainian army, four thousand of them are already fighting on the front
text: About 65,000 women now serve in the Ukrainian army, which is about 30 percent more than at the beginning of the war two years ago. According to The New York Times (NYT), four thousand of them participate in the fighting. At the same time, they face the same fear and the same harsh conditions as the men on the front line.
